metadata.title: CVE-2013-7448 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in wiki.c in didiwiki allows remoteattackers to read arbitrary files via the page parameter to api/page/get.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7448` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

didiwiki - 0.5-11+deb8u1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: didiwiki package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.5-11+deb8u1build0.14.04.1').
